page.title: 17SUNDAY IN THE WHITEMOOR
page.content: In the morning my family and I go to Chapel.Either it is a usual service or Bible Fellowship or a Family Service. Sometimes my family leads it.Then there is Sunday School. When we return, I help with the dinner or set the table. We have roast beef, chicken or lamb. After if there isn't a Service, I play on my computer, watch T.V.,or go for a walk with my corgi dog. In the Summer we may go to the beach. Sometimes Mum sings with her Choir.She is with the Gospel Singers and the E.C.C.Ladies Choir. In the evening,Mum and Dad go to Chapel.I read a book or prepare for school the next day. I have a bath or shower, watch T.V. or do a jigsaw.Mum and Dad return at 7.30p.m.and we play cards. Sometimes friends come. I have my supper and go to bed at 8.30p.m.
